tasks.label: Build NBVS (CMake)
args:
set -euo pipefail
if ! command -v brew >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Homebrew not found. Install Homebrew first: https://brew.sh' >&2; exit 1; fi
if ! pkg-config --exists glew; then echo 'Installing GLEW via Homebrew...'; brew install glew; fi
if ! pkg-config --exists glfw3; then echo 'Installing GLFW via Homebrew...'; brew install glfw; fi
if ! command -v cmake >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'Installing CMake via Homebrew...'; brew install cmake; fi
mkdir -p build
cd build
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo ..
cmake --build . --config RelWithDebInfo -j$(sysctl -n hw.ncpu | awk '{print int($1*0.75)}')
